org.ftccommunity.ftcxtensible.interfaces

Interface AbstractRobotContext

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ArcadeDriveTeleop, AutoMode, BasicLayout, CameraOpMode, ExtensibleLinearOpMode, ExtensibleOpMode, GamepadRecording, HelloWorld, K9TankDrive, LinearAutoModeAdapter, NetworkOpMode, ReadWriteExtensibleOpMode, RobotContext, SimpleDemo, SimpleOpMode, StandardOpMode, xNetworkAnalyzer

    public interface AbstractRobotContext
    Main Robot Context Interface, any class claiming to be a Robot Context compatible class should inherit this interface
    Since:
    0.2.2
    Author:
    David
    See Also:
    RobotContext
